en.title: StarTimes Video Downloader & Merger Tool V1.1.1
en.error_m3u8_url_prefix: Error: The M3U8 URL must start with http:// or https://
en.cookie_prompt: Please enter the Cookie value (leave blank if none):
en.warning_no_cookie: Warning: No Cookie value provided, protected content may not be downloadable.
en.star_init_data_not_found: STAR-INIT-DATA not found in M3U8 file
en.star_init_data_saved_as_init_mp4: STAR-INIT-DATA decoded and saved as init.mp4: {path}
en.failed_to_save_star_init_data: Failed to decode/save STAR-INIT-DATA: {error}. Falling back to init_segment_url if available.
en.removed_redundant_init_segment_url: Init segment URL removed from download list as STAR-INIT-DATA was used.
en.no_segments_found: No segment files found in M3U8 file
en.no_additional_segments_to_download: No additional segments to download, relying on STAR-INIT-DATA init.mp4.
en.no_segments_to_download_summary: No video segments to download (only init.mp4 might be processed from STAR-INIT-DATA).
en.file_access_issue_suggestion: Ensure you have write permissions to the output directory and sufficient disk space.
en.segment_download_exception: An error occurred while downloading segment {url}: {error}
en.no_segments_to_combine: No segments to combine. Output file will not be created.
en.combine_failed_py_binary: Failed to combine segments using pure Python binary method: {error}
en.combine_failed_py_binary_generic: An unknown error occurred during segment combination (Python binary): {error}
en.cleanup_complete: Cleanup complete! Deleted: {deleted} files and directories.
en.cleanup_complete_message: All intermediate files have been cleaned up, only the merged video file remains.
en.cleanup_skipped_message: All intermediate files have been kept, you can use them to re-run the merge process.
en.combine_process_error: An error occurred during the combine process!
en.choose_language: Choose language (1 for English, 2 for Chinese):
en.headers_saved_to_config: Default headers saved to config.json for future use (excluding Cookie).
en.headers_info_prompt: You can modify these headers in config.json if needed.
en.find_video_in_current_dir: You can find the video in the current directory.
en.cleanup_prompt: Do you want to clean up intermediate downloaded files? (y/N):

zh.title: StarTimes 视频下载与合并工具 V1.1.1
zh.error_m3u8_url_prefix: 错误：M3U8 链接必须以 http:// 或 https:// 开头
zh.cookie_prompt: 请输入 Cookie 值（没有则留空）:
zh.warning_no_cookie: 警告：未提供 Cookie 值，受保护内容可能无法下载。
zh.downloading_m3u8: 正在下载 M3U8 文件: {m3u8_url}
zh.m3u8_download_success: M3U8 文件下载成功 ({length} 字节)
zh.star_init_data_found_map: 在 EXT-X-MAP 标签中找到 STAR-INIT-DATA: {data}...
zh.star_init_data_not_found: M3U8 文件中未找到 STAR-INIT-DATA
zh.star_init_data_saved_as_init_mp4: STAR-INIT-DATA 已解码并保存为 init.mp4: {path}
zh.failed_to_save_star_init_data: 解码/保存 STAR-INIT-DATA 失败: {error}。如果可用，将尝试使用 init_segment_url。
zh.removed_redundant_init_segment_url: Init 分段 URL 已从下载列表中移除，因为已使用 STAR-INIT-DATA。
zh.no_segments_found: M3U8 文件中未找到分段文件
zh.no_additional_segments_to_download: 没有额外分段可供下载，将依赖 STAR-INIT-DATA 中的 init.mp4。
zh.no_segments_to_download_summary: 没有视频分段可供下载（可能仅处理了来自 STAR-INIT-DATA 的 init.mp4）。
zh.file_access_issue_suggestion: 确保您对输出目录有写入权限并有足够的磁盘空间。
zh.start_downloading_segments: 开始下载 {count} 个视频分段...
zh.download_progress: 进度: {completed}/{total} ({percent:.2f}%) 失败: {failed} 用时: {elapsed:.2f}分 预计剩余: {eta:.2f}分
zh.segment_download_exception: 下载分段 {url} 时发生错误: {error}
zh.download_summary: 下载完成。完成: {completed}, 失败: {failed}, 总计: {total}
zh.no_segments_to_combine: 没有分段可合并。不会创建输出文件。
zh.combine_failed_py_binary: 使用纯 Python 二进制方法合并分段失败: {error}
zh.combine_failed_py_binary_generic: 分段合并（Python 二进制）时发生未知错误: {error}
zh.starting_cleanup: 正在开始清理中间文件...
zh.cleanup_complete: 清理完成！共删除: {deleted} 个文件和目录。
zh.cleanup_complete_message: 所有中间文件已清理完毕，只保留合并后的视频文件。
zh.cleanup_skipped_message: 所有中间文件均已保留，您可以利用它们重新执行合并过程。
zh.choose_language: 选择语言 (1 为英文, 2 为中文):
zh.invalid_language_choice: 无效选择。请输入 1 或 2。
zh.headers_saved_to_config: 默认请求头已保存到 config.json，供将来使用 (不包括 Cookie)。
zh.headers_info_prompt: 如果需要，您可以在 config.json 中修改这些请求头。
zh.file_size: 文件大小: {size} 字节 ({mb:.2f} MB)
zh.find_video_in_current_dir: 您可以在当前目录中找到视频文件。
zh.cleanup_prompt: 是否要清理中间下载文件？(y/N):
